title: Night-time city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A car drives down a city street at night with multiple braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The video shows a car driving down a city street at night. The road is wet and there are several other cars on the road. The traffic light is red and there is a pedestrian crossing the street. The weather is clear and visibility is good.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a very slow speed because of the multiple braking events. The driver is being cautious and maintaining a safe distance from the other cars on the road. The pedestrian crossing the street is another safety consideration that the driver is paying attention to.
